collectible.title: Voucher for 1 Fuck
collectible.subtitle: Turns out Panty does give a fuck!
collectible.text: Panty's days and nights have more ghost hunting than she'd prefer, but she has a long list of people she wants to fuck (or fuck again), and you're on it. She gave you this golden ticket to put you right at the top of the list. Give her a booty call any time and she'll fit you into her tight schedule of fitting into her tight pussy.
